Item.description: Useful for getting drunk. Label indicates the ABV is 47.3%

Item.name: Bottle of Beer

Item.name: Medical Ethanol
Item.description: Medical alcohol used for crafting and treatment of Psychosis. Drink responsibly.

Item.name: Energy Drink
Item.description: A drink that makes the user faster, but might also get them sick.
